name: Rite of Passage (Leonard Plantey)
description:
A game made for the Global Game Jam 2021 !

Theme : Lost and Found

Goal : In order to start the level, you need to sacrifice one tablet per altar. These tablets are your abilities. Make the right choices and try to reach the exit.

Level Designer / UI / Pixel art : Leonard Plantey

Game Designer / Programmer : Franck Gallay
